title: Between Balloons
description: Between Balloons is the story of Joey Abbott a young girl in the fictional town of Bayberry, Texas. Joey's life is nearly perfect, until her mother dies unexpectedly. Joey and her mother were uncommonly close, and she is left behind to pick up the pieces. She is left with a father that she barely knows. She tries to heal with the help of the new boy in town, who is dealing with pain of his own. This is the story of a young girl who is trying to figure out who she is without the person that meant the most to her.
author: Kimberly  Russell
